title: League randomly minimizes itself during games?
body:
So im not sure if this is something on my end or not but... During the middle of a game even sometimes the champion loading screen my League will just minimize itself for no apparent reason.  Nothing in the background is opened.  League just minimizes itself to my desktop.  Not sure if its a problem on my end or what.  

The game doesnt close or anything and i can easily just re open it but its just an annoyance because it seems to always happen at the worst time lol

replies.body: Recently same thing started happening to me. This happens in the middle of every game. It's always after games are started, and I dies so many times from this issue... Any advice?

There may be a background application trying to take window focus away from League. The first step I'd recommend in troubleshooting this is [**performing a clean boot**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3) to ensure your background apps can't conflict with League.

Let me know if this caused any changes.

Its still doing it.

Since you're still had this issue after confirming all your background apps (such as Skype, Discord, Curse, etc) were closed out, we'll need to look through your system logs to further troubleshoot this. I recommend running some logs with our [**HRT App**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can get back to you.

Let me know if you run into any issues.

If you use Skype, set it to do not disturb. This was a problem for me for a while, when you get a skype message, it pops up on top of the map, but invisible, so anytime you click in that corner, it gets focus and tabs you. Some antivirus use a similar popup, so check those too, enable any game mode or similar that they may have.
Same thing happens to me once and a while. No idea what is causing this!
